text:
I am trying to build static previews of multiple pluto notebooks in one julia session. All of them contain WGLMakie plots

All of them start with this cell.
```begin
	_a_ = 1 # make sure this cell is run before other Pkg cell
	
	import Pkg
	Pkg.activate(temp = true)
	
	Pkg.add(["WGLMakie", "JSServe"])
	using WGLMakie, JSServe
	
	Page(exportable = true)
end```
They all only show the the first plot of the notebook.

Is this a bug, or am I doing something wrong?
